real live bits from the dvd...
This DVD is for every family in the UK, and shows you 
that breastfeeding is natural and normal. Did you 
know that babies who aren’t breastfed are 5 times more 
likely to end up in hospital with serious tummy bugs? Or 
that in countries like Australia and Norway, people 
think breastfeeding is as normal as putting the kettle
